articles.title: Lionel Messi Best of All Time Although Diego Maradona Was Also Great: Argentina Coach Lionel Scaloni
articles.description: Argentina fans have long preferred Maradona over Messi but attitudes appear to be shifting after the PSG forward led the team to lift the World Cup last month for the first time since Maradona inspired them to win it in 1986.
articles.content:
Lionel Messi has surpassed Diego Maradona as the greatest player of all time, Argentina’s World Cup-winning coach Lionel Scaloni has said.

articles.description: A 12-year-old girl in Argentina tragically died after allegedly participating in the dangerous TikTok "choking challenge."
articles.content:
A 12-year-old girl in Argentina died this week after attempting the deadly “choking challenge” first popularized on TikTok.
